'''"Dueling Sigil"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Dueling Sigil" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] by completing the [[Time Trial Challenge]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in [[Erinnyes Forest]].
